attributes.action: Implement safety and or speed cameras on Western Road, Crowborough.
attributes.additional_details: Past refusal from other government providers.
attributes.background: Make the local highway agency implement the measures as they have refused to prior.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local roads are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
